segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is gross with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing like a filthy flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and pooling on the floor—revolting mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, oblivious, which is even more annoying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her towel on that plate looks damp now from the splashes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids—filthy hands in the cookie jar, spreading crumbs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that stool, probably tracking dirt everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, eager for stolen, germy treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets inviting dust and who knows what inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole place reeks of neglect and uncleanliness to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden outside can't hide this indoor slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a sloppy, unhygienic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so distasteful and avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR
